MAN.TITLE: moment
MAN.SHORT_DESCRIPTION: non central moments of all orders

PARAM_ITEM.PARAM_DESCRIPTION: : real or complex vector or matrix

DESCRIPTION.P: moment(x,ord) is the non central moment or order ord of the elements of x.

If a third argument of type string 'r' (or 1 ) or 'c' (or 2) is used, we get in the first case, a row vector mom such that mom(j) contains the non central moment of order ord of the j column of x. moment(x,ord,'c') is used in the same way for the non central moments in the rows.

MAN.AUTHOR: Carlos Klimann
MAN.BIBLIO: Wonacott, T.H. & Wonacott, R.J.; Introductory Statistics, fifth edition, J.Wiley & Sons, 1990.
